GET IN TOUCH

Add Another Set of Eyes

For less than one-fifth the cost of another supervisor, catch errors quickly and eliminate issues on the plant floor you weren't even aware of.

Employee performance can make or break your business

Don't just accept workforce issues as part of quarterly losses. Get an eagle's eye view of every employee and train or correct an employee with kinematic data on what they need to improve. Learn where to add more or less employees to tasks as needed by the historical difficulty level. Schedule different workers for different production runs and tasks that they are best suited for.

$5000

lost on average for every minute of downtime

23%

of downtime is due to human error

Validated Tech

Tristar's technology is based on cutting-edge clinically validated techniques as well as the state-of-the-art computer vision and machine learning techniques, researched right here in Boston at MIT and Harvard. Our models predict and detect body movement and location to infer problematic states in real-time through AI, computer vision, and biophysiological signal analysis. Join us at the forefront of tech and medicine.
